channel.title: Special ANIMATION
channel.description:
How do I add the animation for special? And how do I make the weapon have a special on it?
I added the special bar but I need to know how to use it so when someone clicks it it does it animation and gets used and hits higher. I've tried Clawzfury's tut but it didn't work for me! ;
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=452844.0]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=452844.0[/url]
Bump!!

item.title: Special ANIMATION
item.dc:creator: @aug551 aug551
item.description:
@aug551 wrote:

alright well u know in specials.java?
yea there it says case ####; and stuff like that right?
add

case (you’re item num);

then SCROLL down untill u see
bunch of case stuff its the second one
then agen put the stuff
case (number);
then follow his instructions but i think its this error you're getting if im right well if u STILL didn't get it pm me or il just do it for u in teamviewer :)

Read full topic
